title: Drawing, "Harold S. Anderson House: Round Illuminated Table", March 10, 1937
medium: Graphite and black ink on tracing paper
markings: Stamp in black ink at lower center: DONALD DESKEY/ 630 FIFTH AVENUE/NEW YORK CITY
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite with dimensions, instructions, materials; inscribed in graphite in stamp: 6080; F.S.D.; ANDERSON; Olsson / P.S. / D. / 3.10.37.; 4/8/37 1 GREENPOINT; lower center, below stamp: ONE TABLE 36" DIA. 16" HIGH./TUFLEX TOP 1/2" THICK./SANDBLASTED UNDERSIDE AREA 7 1/2" DIA./CENTRE UPRIGHT 6" TUBE. REFLECTOR INSIDE & SWITCH/BEIGE WHITE LAQUER [SIC] AS PER SAMPLE/POL. CHROM. BASE
description: Perspective, plan, and elevation drawings for circular table. Table top in Tuflex glass; reflector at center of table top. Center tubular pedestal leg in beige/white lacquer. Base with four tubular legs, horizontal and curved at end to form feet; legs in polished chrome.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Harold S. Anderson House: Round Illuminated Table", March 10, 1937.
March 10, 1937. Graphite and black ink on tracing paper. Gift of Donald Deskey. 1975-11-713.
